articles.author: By ANDREW SELSKY Associated Press
articles.title: Facebook riles tiny Oregon town with plan for undersea cable
articles.description: TIERRA DEL MAR, Ore. (AP) — A battle playing out in a tiny Oregon town with no stoplights or cellphone service is pitting residents against one of the world's biggest tech companies.
articles.content:
TIERRA DEL MAR, Ore. (AP) A battle playing out in a tiny Oregon town with no stoplights or cellphone service is pitting residents against one of the world's biggest tech companies.
Locals in coastal Tierra del Mar are trying to stop Facebook from using prope… [+5665 chars]

articles.title: Man to serve a year in jail over killing of Franky the pug
articles.description: WINTER HARBOR, Maine (AP) — One of two Maine men charged with killing a pug named Franky that belonged to their employer was ordered to serve a year in jail.
articles.content:
WINTER HARBOR, Maine (AP) One of two Maine men charged with killing a pug named Franky that belonged to their employer was ordered to serve a year in jail.
Justin Chipman, who was convicted in the August 2018 shooting of the dog, was sentenced to three years… [+773 chars]
